description: This file provides an API layer for interacting with a backend REST service managing todo items. It includes functions for fetching, creating, updating, deleting, and performing bulk actions on todos, using HTTP methods like GET, POST, PATCH, and DELETE.

methods.name: fetchTodos({ status, q, sort, direction } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of todos from the server, supporting optional filtering and sorting parameters.

methods.name: createTodo(todo)
methods.description: Creates a new todo item on the server with provided data.

methods.name: updateTodo(id, updates)
methods.description: Updates an existing todo item identified by ID, using PATCH for partial updates.

methods.name: deleteTodo(id)
methods.description: Deletes a todo item identified by ID.

methods.name: bulkAction(ids, action)
methods.description: Performs a bulk action (complete, incomplete, delete) on multiple todo items.

ctags.name: fetchTodos
ctags.pattern: /^export async function fetchTodos({ status, q, sort, direction } = {}) {$/
